name: Daisy's Quest
description:
Disclaimer - 1 post jam update: fixed camera in final boss room and some collision issues. (nothing do do with gameplay) I'm putting this here for 100% transparency :) Enjoy!

AD - Move

S - Go Down

SPACE - Jump

A normal happy quest.

By: llamaking, Riptide, Nebora, Bteven

For some reason the credit line in game for Bteven is not there and I do not want to fix it until after the jam. He contributed many great levels and deservers to be credited as level designer.
